high_descs: Turn around take one step and then turn left to the bed.
Pick up the book behind the computer on the red sheet.
Turn around and walk toward the wall and stop at the wall and turn left towards the computer table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the table lamp to read the book.

high_descs: Turn right and go to the side of the bed.
Pick up the book from the bed.
Turn around and walk forward, then turn left to face the desk with your back to the safe.
anns.task_desc: Examine the book by lamp light.

high_descs: turn around, walk to the side of the bed
grab the book on the bed
turn around, walk to the side of the desk
turn on the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: grab the book from the bed, turn on the lamp on the desk
